title: Change color theme to white and yellow with colored cards

requirements.text: Update the global color theme to use white as the primary background color and yellow as the primary accent color throughout the application

quotes: change the colour theme to white and yellow

acceptanceCriteria: Primary background colors are white or very light neutral tones
Yellow is used as the primary accent color for buttons, links, and highlights
The color palette in tailwind.config.js and index.css is updated to reflect white and yellow theme
Dark mode (if present) maintains appropriate contrast with yellow accents

requirements.text: Add background colors to all card components across all pages (Home, About, Services, GCC, Industries, Insights, Careers, Contact) to make them visually distinct

quotes: put some colours in cards on each page

acceptanceCriteria: All card components on Home page have visible background colors
All card components on About page have visible background colors
All card components on Services page have visible background colors
All card components on GCC page have visible background colors
All card components on Industries page have visible background colors
All card components on Insights page have visible background colors
All card components on Careers page have visible background colors
All card components on Contact page have visible background colors
Card colors are complementary to the white and yellow theme
Card colors provide sufficient contrast for text readability

constraints: Maintain existing page layouts and content structure
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall layout or information architecture
